pageContext.other: This is the first instance where I've encountered measurements written with zeros in front.  Assuming they are still metric, Also there is a signature written in the bottom left corner but I'm unable to decipher it.
pageContext.composition: Blade chipped; overall pattern of slight short diagonal incised lines.  Now very faint.  Faces taper from slight ridge above centre.  Secondary grinding surface.
pageContext.associations: With 6743/2,/3,/4  Flange axe, [...]-flanged axe,, side-looped spearhead
pageContext.publications: Trans, Woolhope Naturalist's Field Club 1947, pp. xlv - xlix, and photograph (L.F. Chitty)
pageContext.collection: Hereford Museum & Art Gallery, Acc. No. 6743/1, Donor: Mr. R.A. Smith, Netherwood Manor, Tenbury Wells, Worcs.
pageContext.site: herefordshire, thornbury, netherwood, this provenance is extremely dubious.
